amendment.description: To end lending schemes that force taxpayers to repay the loans of delinquent developers and bailout failed or poorly planned local projects.

action.text: Amendment SA 796 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 738.
Amendment SA 796 under the order of 10/20/2011, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 73 - 26. Record Vote Number: 185.
